body_content.explanation: to look up at the stars and objects in space as a hobby, for scientific study, or as part of astrology (= the belief that the position of the stars influences people's lives):
examples: He tells me of entire nights spent stargazing until dawn.
Next time you get a chance to stargaze, look at Jupiter.

body_content.explanation: to watch famous people in a public place:
examples: You'll have an opportunity to stargaze next year when the Walt Disney Studios opens in Paris.
I took my seat in the small theater in Beverly Hills well before the start time. I was stargazing.
Collins, aged 70, has been stargazing celebs for a long time.
